response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which holds immense value for you at $1,500,000. I am confident that this product will not only meet but exceed your expectations and contribute significantly to your endeavors.

To make this offer even more compelling, I am extending it to you at a special introductory price of $1,350,000. This is a limited-time offer designed to ensure that you benefit from the best possible value while securing a high-quality asset for your needs.

Please consider this proposal carefully and let me know if you have any questions or require further information. I am here to assist you throughout the process and ensure a smooth transaction.

Looking forward to your positive response.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1350000}
